title: MorphWatch
summary: A simple and beautiful Android Wear watch face.
description: MorphWatch offers all the simplicity and beauty of MorphClock, wrapped up into a wrist-sized package.Features:* One time morphs into the next as time ticks by.* Background changes to match the sun's position where you live.Permissions:* Your coarse location is used to calculate the sun's position.* That's it.This app is based on open source libraries:* Android Number Morphing, by Davy Leggieri https://github.com/bydavy/android-number-morphing* Solar Positioning library, by Klaus Brunner https://github.com/KlausBrunner/solarpositioning
descriptionHTML:
MorphWatch offers all the simplicity and beauty of MorphClock, wrapped up into a wrist-sized package.

Features:
* One time morphs into the next as time ticks by.
* Background changes to match the sun's position where you live.

Permissions:
* Your coarse location is used to calculate the sun's position.
* That's it.

This app is based on open source libraries:
* Android Number Morphing, by Davy Leggieri https://github.com/bydavy/android-number-morphing
* Solar Positioning library, by Klaus Brunner https://github.com/KlausBrunner/solarpositioning
